title: Foil-Package Fish with Horseradish Sauce
summary: Foil-Package Fish with Horseradish Sauce might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 219 calories, 26g of protein, and 11g of fat each. For $3.4 per serving, this recipe covers 25% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up baby spinach leaves, horseradish, whitefish fillets, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the cream you could follow this main course with the Blueberry Ice Cream as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 35 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 84%. This score is tremendous. Similar recipes include Shrimp Pastan in a Foil Package, Foil-Wrapped Fish with Creamy Parmesan Sauce, and Foil-Wrapped Fish with Creamy Parmesan Sauce.

winePairing.pairingText: Fish can be paired with Pinot Grigio, Gruener Veltliner, and Pinot Noir. Fish is as diverse as wine, so it's hard to pick wines that go with every fish. A crisp white wine, such as a pinot grigio or Gr√ºner Veltliner, will suit any delicately flavored white fish. Meaty, strongly flavored fish such as salmon and tuna can even handle a light red wine, such as a pinot noir. The Santa Margherita Pinot Grigio with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 26 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Santa Margherita Pinot Grigio
productMatches.description: A pale straw yellow. Clean, crisp fragrance with intense yet elegant hints of quince. Fresh, harmonious fruit set off by slight sweetness with a long finish full of delicate, tangy flavor.

instructions: Heat oven to 375F.                                            Mix first 4 ingredients until well blended.                                               Place 1 fish piece onto center of each of 4 large sheets heavy-duty foil; top each with 1 cup spinach and second fish piece. Top with zucchini, peppers and cream cheese mixture; fold to make packets. Place in single layer in 15x10x1-inch pan.                                             Bake 15 min. or until fish flakes easily with fork.  Remove from oven.  Let stand 5 min.

steps.step: Mix first 4 ingredients until well blended.
Place 1 fish piece onto center of each of 4 large sheets heavy-duty foil; top each with 1 cup spinach and second fish piece. Top with zucchini, peppers and cream cheese mixture; fold to make packets.
Place in single layer in 15x10x1-inch pan.
Bake 15 min. or until fish flakes easily with fork.
